code: From Undecidability.TM Require Import Util.TM_facts Switch.
Variable pM1 : pTM sig F1 n.
Variable pM2 : pTM sig F2 n.
Lemma Seq_Realise R1 R2 : pM1 ⊨ R1 -> pM2 ⊨ R2 -> Seq ⊨ ⋃_y ((R1 |_ y) ∘ R2).

Lemma Seq_TerminatesIn R1 T1 T2 : pM1 ⊨ R1 -> projT1 pM1 ↓ T1 -> projT1 pM2 ↓ T2 -> projT1 Seq ↓ (fun tin i => exists i1 i2, T1 tin i1 /\ 1 + i1 + i2 <= i /\ forall tout yout, R1 tin (yout, tout) -> T2 tout i2).
exists i1, i2; repeat split; auto.

Lemma Seq_TerminatesIn' R1 T1 T2 : pM1 ⊨ R1 -> projT1 pM1 ↓ T1 -> projT1 pM2 ↓ T2 -> projT1 Seq ↓ (fun tin i => exists i1, T1 tin i1 /\ forall tout yout, R1 tin (yout, tout) -> exists i2, 1 + i1 + i2 <= i /\ T2 tout i2).
Lemma Seq_RealiseIn (R1 : Rel _ _) (R2 : Rel _ (F2 * _)) k1 k2: pM1 ⊨c(k1) R1 -> pM2 ⊨c(k2) R2 -> Seq ⊨c(1 + k1 + k2) ⋃_y ((R1 |_y) ∘ R2).
Notation "A ;; B" := (Seq A B) (right associativity, at level 65).
